news.content:
Your Weekly 3Node Update!


https://forum.threefold.io/t/december-8th-3node-team-update-shipping-status-expanding-our-partner-network/1555


We‚Äôre in the midst of shipping a large batch of Titans to North America, and we‚Äôre expanding our partner network. üåç


More info within!
news.excerpt: We‚Äôre in the midst of shipping a large batch of Titans to North America, and we‚Äôre expanding our partner network.
